website_summaries.verdict: Offers an ultra-smooth doodle and design experience thanks to dual drive technology in this updated model.
pros: Popular among adults, as they enjoy using the pen to create lifehacks
Design improvements offer better speed control, which is particularly helpful in more detailed creations
cons: Occasional jams reported when using some third-party filaments, though jams are fairly easy to clear

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, great for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 14 year old for his birthday. By the end of the first day he was creating like he had been born with it. Very user friendly, easy to manipulate and control. Recommend this one (we own two other brands) to anyone just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: c. m.

customer_reviews.title: Still learning fun learning
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. More help would be great. Youtube videos helped a lot
customer_reviews.author: K. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Product can be ruined after your first use, never to work again!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine wouldn't work after a 2.5 hour session making things. The plastic filament would not come out even though I followed the directions on how to get it out.. So, I wasted $78.00 on a cool thing that breaks the first time you use it. I should have sent it back right away, but this appears to be a design flaw (that it freezes and is no longer functional). I would like a replacement, but I doubt if Amazon will give me one. How about it Amazon...I'm an artist and should be able to make terrific things with the 3Doodler if given the chance. I made a pyramid, and a sculpture, but then it froze on me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Doyle, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER COOL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pen is SUPER COOL!!! My tweens are loving it! I actually am having fun with it too! I thought it is like a magical crayon!!! It is easy to use and you can create endless creations. You don't have to be an "artist" to use. You just have to have a great imagination! Has kept my daughters entertained for hours. So happy with the purchases. Bought one for each of my daughters. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Whoopie Pie

customer_reviews.title: Not cordless... and watch out for pungent plastic fumes
customer_reviews.text: We didn't realize this has to be plugged in to use it when we bought it. We did find a battery pack for it from a different seller that lets our daughter use it without having to be close to an outlet. That made it much better. One of the types of plastic... I think the glossy one... is very stinky. Our whole house smelled like hot plastic when we used it. The other kind was much better.
customer_reviews.author: vew

customer_reviews.title: Quality refills
customer_reviews.text: Refills are 3mm diameter and are compatible with the 3Doodler Create.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: untruthful marketing
customer_reviews.text: Disliked how it worked and disliked how it received high marks on Amazon, when looked up on google- over 50% 1 star. Liked the handheld size, Liked how easy to return through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter delighted
customer_reviews.text: I liked it because it made my granddaughter happy on Thanksgiving afternoon. She had seen an earlier model and was pleased with how the Create+ model had been improved.
customer_reviews.author: self

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's like playing with an hot glue gun I don't know why I didn't realize that before but I ran through half a pack of the filament that comes with it and I still don't know how to use this , yes if you want to you can do some cool stuff with it, but the price is going to stack up as you only can use there filament suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Or not original or used.
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfactory. The product came without the original package. Everything were open in an Amazon box. In other words I paid full price for probably something that was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Andreia Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you have a 3d printer you can use it to fuse prints together. It does come with abunch of plastic. It's also got a book with patterns so you can make things.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Bachand

customer_reviews.title: Imagination central
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his first pen so much we upgraded to this one. He uses it to modify his action figures and man are they looking cool. Amazing product and if you have an articulate kid, this is a great tool to tap into imagination. We got a mat and a clear plastic case for storage. The first pen was a gift and a great bridge to learn how 3d pens work. Great gift idea for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Olson

customer_reviews.title: Extrusion of the plastic is too fast to control.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this and start playing with possibilities but immediately found that the extrusion of the plastic was just too fast. I would not recommend this for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Annette T.

customer_reviews.title: Hand held 3D printer pen - Fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it (but so do adults)! Brings out everyone’s creativity as soon as they start using it. Be sure to get extra plastic packs because you’ll want to keep creating with this pen. Great invention! Is like a free form 3D printer only is hand held.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold up to normal use.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started off really loving this pen but then it stated clogging. Then it broke and now isn’t working at all. Frustrating because it was an early birthday gift to give her something to do during the stay at home order.
customer_reviews.author: LP in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Brilliant product. Comes with a lot of different ABS and PLA filament. And good ideas to start working with it. I had few art projects that needed a very specific shape to be created and I needed it to be very light weight, this made my wish come true.
customer_reviews.author: Robbert

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and all the kids have been using it. It's lots of fun and had kept them entertained got hours. Had to order refills a few days after 😊
customer_reviews.author: Hildabob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 7 out of 5 stars!!! It's wonderful. My 12 year old daughter is extremely hard to buy for. She hasnt put this thing down since she opened it! The picture above she made the first day! Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: came with an ugly presentation
customer_reviews.text: Bad presentación, look like a cheap thing! Is not cheap! And it's was for present so now will look like something used! Patética compra
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s supposed to and that’s the best I can say. It’d be fun for smaller kids. But I think anyone older. (Teens included) would be a lot less interested because it’s hard to make anything actually useful. You can use different kinds of filaments which is cool. But it also gets very hot on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Liner

customer_reviews.title: Good starter but not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Do not suggest. You can only use their appropriate material. That doesn’t leave many options available.
customer_reviews.author: Travis thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fun and therapeutic !
customer_reviews.text: My artist daughter is having loads of fun with this doodler ! Easy to use - takes time to perfect your designs though . Keeps the brain working and very good therapy too !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creativity stimulator
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with a 3D print machine. I let me children create things. I was amazed at the the imagination this thing brought out. The quality isn't a retail but it was great to see the things they came up with and continue to come up with.
customer_reviews.author: sydney cox

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't know how the pen works as IT WASN'T IN THE BOX!!
customer_reviews.text: No pen. No way to review. Package had the filaments and the instructions. No charger or pen. Fuming!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic writing pen
customer_reviews.text: Have tried it out yet but so far, looks wide, it’s beautiful and I will update this written review as soon as I get to use it! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaHarrison

customer_reviews.title: Very will made product. Lots of accessories, great instructions!
customer_reviews.text: this thing works really well. However, don't think you can plug it in and do what you see in the videos, it takes some time to learn the technique that works best for what you want to do. That being said, I'd totally recommend this 3d pen.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: problem
customer_reviews.text: The first one received had to be sent back. The plastic insert got stuck in place and would not reverse out. The second one we received is useable. However, it can easily mess up. My son and I were extremely careful to follow the directions. Still encountered issues. Very sensitive item to use.
customer_reviews.author: curiousity

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Trash
customer_reviews.text: I spent a week and broke down. The price is expensive, and it's easy to break down. Very disappointing. It was fun so I bought a lot of filaments, but I can’t use. “Expensive Trash”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play
customer_reviews.text: This model is a little advanced for a beginner child, but I am having fun. Kid should get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Oknarb

customer_reviews.title: fun fun til the motor got weak.
customer_reviews.text: so disapointed. I had such fun for a couple weeks then the motor lost power and doesnt push out filament. so so disappointed. Iwonder if theres parts to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to make detail. Teenage to young adult use is better. For the money its ok.
customer_reviews.author: carshop1

customer_reviews.title: Fun for teens
customer_reviews.text: We love this pen! Works great! Took us a little bit to figure it out, but once we did, it's super easy and fun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the pen so far. If you plan to use if when you use up the sample filaments I would go for PLA filaments. It will work with PLA for 3D printers that are 3mm, and it's much more easier to work with than ABS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool beans!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super hella cool! I received one for Christmas and I'm STILL using it! I was extremely excited when unboxing this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Fun Art!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a work in progress!! But we are having fun making 3D Art!!
customer_reviews.author: MissyE

customer_reviews.title: HEADS UP!
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying filament for this 3D pen, do not click above where it says "buy all 3 together". It is the wrong size filament. This pen uses 3mm filament. The one above that is 32 colors is 1.75mm. The pen is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a crafty kid
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old was able to figure this out and use it right away on her own
customer_reviews.author: E. Burn

customer_reviews.title: Really fun
customer_reviews.text: Even tho it does not have as many settings as other pens offer it is a great 3d pen for anyone looking to buy one. I have made several cool things with it and it has held up well. Heats up quickly to start using right away.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this. She was being creative with it all night. A lot of colors. It came fast and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: VS Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pen’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pen!! I have had it for a few days now and I can kinda draw ok stuff but it’s not the pens fault. I have noticed that it is a little loud and sometimes the plastic will bubble when it comes out but other than that this pen is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell H

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use out of the box, proprietary filament strands makes it hard to find when you're in a pinch, but the quality of the pen is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ger Vang

customer_reviews.title: Give me my money back!!!
customer_reviews.text: Penn clogged so bad I could clear it Now it won't even heat up. Want my money back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Manning

customer_reviews.title: Supplies
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to work with 1.75mm filament. Am I doing something wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Dan T Bobes

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the product itself. The pen works perfectly. Yes, there is a limited amount of filament but the filament lasts a while. I do recommend this pen over the other pens because I tried a knock off and I had to send it back. Overall this product is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne Ballard

customer_reviews.title: It is not a good doddler
customer_reviews.text: It has broke twice and it was only used 3 days 😢
customer_reviews.author: shauna cooney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Great for tweens!
customer_reviews.text: Smash hit at Christmas! Very little plastic smell, easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: LEO

customer_reviews.title: Creative
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this goes gift, I love the creative side of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hi tech plastic melting design pen
customer_reviews.text: Fun to create with for my 12 year old. I might want to learn how to use it as well. Alot of fun DIY can be created with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Amazon number one
customer_reviews.text: As always Amazon was on top of my order got it pretty quickly to me about it for my son's birthday so I don't know how it works or anything I'll have to ask him always 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Chris Davis

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this pen!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little pen! My son loves it. It is, however, hard to get the plastic in the slot that heats the plastic sometimes. But overall, it is a fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Challenging fun
customer_reviews.text: It takes some practice but, it is fun to create 3D structures or little nick naks
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift for our 11 year old. Everyone wants a turn to try it out, kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Southern

customer_reviews.title: #1 and keeping it
customer_reviews.text: The item was shipped 0romptly, even arriving a day early. Quality was perfect, equatable to lulzbot tad 6 3D printer. Documentation is thorough. I can see why it's the first choice among enthusiasts
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson age 12. He has spent hours designing and building. Best gift ever
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Package damage
customer_reviews.text: Got a box all broken like someone has tried to lay the box flat (all corners ripped off). Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: enji

customer_reviews.title: Works for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Works great.. dont have to stop ever hour or two hours ... Long time use is great
customer_reviews.author: matthias kush

customer_reviews.title: It was a very good Christmas gift for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got to it right away; easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love this thing its great for doodling and repairing otherwise unfixable 3d prints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with refill filament
customer_reviews.text: This pen was great until I ran out of filament. It is not compatible with any one refill pack. Unless you purchase another 3D pen. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Best PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! You just need to be careful not to burn ur fingers.
customer_reviews.author: ㅎㅇㅎ

customer_reviews.title: Refills missing in the box
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to check the contents of the box as soon as you get the item. I got mine with the refills missing and the pen appeared to have been used
customer_reviews.author: Kedar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too complicated for my 11 yr old who is very smart
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids !
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a Christmas gift for my cousin she loves it
customer_reviews.author: jerees afnan

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining and pleased with the quality of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Dunagan

customer_reviews.title: Completely amazed!
customer_reviews.text: This thing can do just about anything. There are a lot of little techniques to making any texture or surface you can think of. I will be using this thing for a long time, and if it ever breaks I’d gladly buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. It works great and it's easy to use. Works as it says in description.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Filaments Very expensive
customer_reviews.text: Filaments Very expensive and prevents me from using it to continue using the pen, as I will probably have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: These did not fit into the 3Doodler start pen I bought earlier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 3Doodler Create+ 3D Printing Pen for Teens, Adults & Creators! - Onyx Black (2020 Model) - with Free Refill Filaments + Stencil Book + Getting Started Guide
feature_bullets: [ALL NEW DUAL DRIVE TECHNOLOGY] The world’s first in a 3D printing device. Featuring improved power, durability, and reliability for a superior doodling experience.

[THE 3DOODLER APP] Get an interactive experience! The app is packed with dedicated easy to follow stencil section and step by step interactive instructions, receive badges for completed projects and photograph & share your creations directly on social media. The App is fully built on iOS & Android.
[EASY TO USE] Just Plug the 3D Pen in, insert 3Doodler Create plastic, Wait for the 3D Pen to heat up and then you're good to extrude!
[FREE 15 COLORS OF PLASTIC REFILLS & STENCIL BOOK] This 3D Pen comes packed with 15 different colors of 3Doodler Create plastic refills & a comprehensive activity guide book.

[SMOOTH 3D DRAWING EXPERIENCE] Get the best 3D drawing experience by only using the best and safest non-toxic 3Doodler Create Plastic Filaments. The Create+ 3D Printing pen is compatible with 3Doodler Create 3mm PLA, ABS and Flexy Plastic only.

[NO RISK PURCHASE] We have a warranty Policy! We deliver on our promises & our awesome customer service team is here to help! You may contact help@the3doodler.com should you have any questions about your 3Doodler.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
